h2_title: Green-Capped Martialist Boss Fight and Guide
content: Certain times, he'll vanish before performing a spinning leap with twin chakrams you'll need to anticipate and evade. Other times, he'll simply toss his chakram at you from afar and let it ride toward you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Green-Capped_Martialist.md', within the main section titled 'Green-Capped Martialist', specifically from the subsection 'Green-Capped Martialist Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Certain times, he'll vanish before performing a spinning leap with twin chakrams you'll need to anticipate and evade. Other times, he'll simply toss his chakram at you from afar and let it ride toward you.
